entry.title: Release Notes for 22.0.12
entry.summary:
We are happy to anounce a new version of our SDK. Here are some important details for this release:

New in this Version Version 22.0.12

• Skillz News - in app, multimedia communication channel for live ops and player engagement • Auto Update - smooth ...
